column1: Atlanta Flames{{#tag:ref|The Flames moved to Calgary in 1980 after years of flagging attendance|group=upper-alpha|name=a}}

Colorado Rockies{{#tag:ref|[[Arthur Imperatore Sr.]] bought the Rockies in 1978 with the intent of moving them to New Jersey but those plans were shelved due to the lack of a suitable arena. Colorado would eventually relocate to the Garden State with [[John McMullen (engineer)|John McMullen]] as the owner|group=upper-alpha|name=b}}
